title: Lemon cake with orange marmalade glaze
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '300g caster sugar', '115g butter', '3 eggs', '225ml buttermilk', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'Glaze', '200g thick-cut orange marmalade', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons icing sugar', 'lemon rind strips']
